user_query: I'm planning a surfing trip to Bali and I need information about surf breaks in Bali. Can you provide me with a list of surf breaks in Bali and their respective countries? Also, tell me the current standings of LaLiga and recommend some footballers to watch out for in the Premier League.

TaskList.description: Retrieve a list of surf breaks in Bali and their respective countries.
Get the current standings of LaLiga.
Recommend footballers to watch out for in the Premier League.
